remarks: The extended sum is the lowest upper bound for the partial sums. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2017.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Dec-2019.)
statement:
esumlub.f $e |- F/ k ph $.
esumlub.0 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
esumlub.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
esumlub.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR* ) $.
esumlub.3 $e |- ( ph -> X < sum* k e. A B ) $.
esumlub $p |- ( ph -> E. a e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) X < sum* k e. a B ) $.
$d A a k $.
$d B a $.
$d X a $.
$d a ph $.
